Title: The Azure Vaults
Description:
There's a problem in the Azure Vault, $n. 

Beneath the Azure Archives rests the Azure Vault. Sindragosa stored many important and dangerous magical curiosities in it.

A large group of Sundered Flame have broken into the vault to unlock its secrets.

You need to go in there and stop the Sundered Flame!
ObjectivesText: Stop the Sundered Flame within the Azure Vaults.

Objectives.Text: Disturbance thwarted within the Azure Vaults
